author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
This PR builds on top of #36988 by adding a relval wf to the matrix in order to test the new ECAL AlCaPhiSym workflow for Run3. It produces nano as output and it will be eventually tested in a tier0 replay (we still need to sort out some details).

#### PR validation:
Tested with:
`runTheMatrix.py -l 139.005 --ibeos -j8 -t8`

#### Backport:
Not a backport. A Backport to 12_3 will be opened soon.

FYI @simonepigazzini @rappoccio @cms-sw/alca-l2
title: Add relval wf `139.005` to test the AlcaEcalPhiSym workflow for Run3
